title: Virginia Man Is 'Rock Of Ages' No. 1 Fan
teaser: Abe Calimag has seen the show more than 500 times, and he's traveled the world to see his favorite musical. Calimag has spent more than $25,000 on tickets and travel, according to the New York Post.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
